content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Plate Production at position(x=52, y=-80)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=52.0, y=-80.0) with fuel source coal
-  Burner Inserter (position x=53.5, y=-78.5) that puts items into the furnace
-  Belt Group that connects the inserter to the furnace

### Iron Plate Production at position(x=62, y=-54)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=62.0, y=-54.0) with fuel source coal

### Chest at position(x=52.5, y=-82.5)
Consists of a single entity
-  Wooden Chest (position x=52.5, y=-82.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into a full inventory
-  Check the inventory of the entity before attempting to insert items
-  Ensure that the entity has enough space to hold the items being inserted

### NAMESPACE
-  No utility functions have been defined by the agent
-  Important variables:
  -  `transport-belt`: int
  -  `burner-inserter`: int
  -  `burner-mining-drill`: int
  -  `wood`: int
  -  `coal`: int
  -  `stone`: int
  -  `iron-ore`: int
  -  `iron-plate`: int
